A virtual shopping assistant app that uses augmented reality to help users try on clothes and makeup virtually before making a purchase.
A language learning app that uses gamification techniques to make learning a new language fun and engaging.
A personal finance app that helps users track their spending, create budgets, and make informed financial decisions.
